name: UNAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants indicating whether the app is allowed to schedule notifications.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user hasn't yet made a choice about whether the app is allowed to schedule notifications.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The app isn't authorized to schedule or receive notifications.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The app is authorized to schedule or receive notifications.

items.name: case provisional
items.desc: The application is provisionally authorized to post noninterruptive user notifications.

items.name: case ephemeral
items.desc: The app is authorized to schedule or receive notifications for a limited amount of time.
